Grounded arrived back at the base.  "Aerotaur...I will take care of 
Trinity, you assume a position.  Listen after the last battle I dug some 
bunker holes in the ground, they are covered and look natural.  There is 
a path from my quarters into them, I need five of you to go into a 
different bunker each, when they are in the right spot, I will give a 
signal, then you jump through, it is primitive but will give us the 
advantage.  Sarge, why don't you, Papertron, and Birdbot take three of 
the bunkers, Areotaur and I can take the other two. I will be able to 
tell where they are with my vibration detector.  We must hold them off 
until Windlord arrives with hopefully Maximal help.  Now does that sound 
ok. And where is BH and that other."

Rudra656@... wrote:

> OOC: Aerotaur is still at the base.
> 
> ::Aerotaur::
>     "Hmm.  I knew they wouldn't stay away.  I hate being right sometimes." 
> He stands waiting for the attack.  A small thought triggered in his 
> mind.  He
> spun around and looked under the base where he had just seen Trinity go. 
> "Trinity, come on out here.  You have to go play inside for a little 
> while. 
> The bad men are coming back."  He opens a com to Zero.  "Zero.  Play time's
> over.  Now we get to fight."
>
